name: Dummy SMTP Server
body:
### Welcome to Dummy SMTP Server

This is a Dummy SMTP Server for Developers, written in C#.

**This application is under heavy development**

*This application will not be able to send or receive real emails, but rather can be used as a dummy server to test your email sending applications which is running in the local host.*

###  Getting started

## Getting started

#### Stable release (recommended)
1. Download the latest binary `zip` file from this link [Dummy.SmtpServer.binary.zip](https://github.com/enbiso/dummy-smtp-server/releases)
2. Extract the `zip` and execute the file.

#### Development release
Clone the master repo
```
git clone https://github.com/farajfarook/dummy-smtp-server.git
```
Open the solution with Visual Studio and build it!

### Authors and Contributors
The application is created by @farajfarook. Special thanks goes to Robert N Wood rob@rnwood.co.uk who published the wonderful library https://smtpserver.codeplex.com which is the backbone of this application.

If you like to contribute to the project, feel free to fork it and add new functionalities or correct bugs.

### Support or Contact
No enterprise support is provided to this product. But always feel free to report any bugs in the github project issues.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
